channel.title: How do i change the owner tags in a source?
channel.description:
----- I got a new source with this owner tagg thing. Like this: Welcome to Funscape Owner = (owner user) how do i change that?Which section is that in to edit? ---AND HOW DO I CHANGE THE DANG MENUS!
Please help!!

item.description:

item.title: How do i change the owner tags in a source?
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

Open client.java and press ctrl h then find FunScape then replace it with your source. Same principal with name. DON’T BE A LEACHER! (Word of warning)
